question:
Consider the following statements about the festival Pongal:
  1. It is a harvest festival in Tamil Nadu
  2. Sun God is revered on this day
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Pongal is celebrated in winter solstice, when, according to the traditional Hindu system, the Sun which has reached the Southern-most point, turns its journey towards North, called Uttharayanam. In short, the festival is celebrated when Sun enters the Zodiac sign of Makara (Capricorn).
